description: Kidd is quickly cuffed to the standing cage. Taylor unties his slave Ryan whom he scolds for disobedience. Ryan briefly worships Taylor's boots, then is ordered to help Taylor punish Kidd. Kidd pleads with Taylor not to take him to jail, offering to be Taylor's slave. With Ryan assisting him, Taylor ties Kidd tightly to the standing cage which continues to house the office prop. Ryan gags Kidd with a bandanna, then goes back to worshipping Taylor's boots. Taylor paddles Kidd, occasionally swatting Ryan. Taylor flogs Kidd. Taylor has Ryan untie Kidd, strip him down and get him on the spanking bench. He collars Kidd, greases up Kidd's ass, has Kidd blow Ryan while he buttplugs Kidd, then uses a razor strop on Kidd's ass, then flogs his back and butt, and uses a black leather slapper on him. Taylor takes Kidd off the spanking bench and sends Ryan for the straitjacket.
title: Tops & Robbers: Caught in the Act
